details: • Enhanced Generative Adverserial Imputatuional Network(G.A.I.N) framework by implementing DCGAN architecture for missing data imputation, improving upon traditional GAN approach with 13% higher accuracy in data reconstruction.
• Innovated silicon photonic component design by replacing VGGNet/ResNet with data-efficient image transformers (DeiT),achieving 12% better component generation through improved feature extraction.
• Built university-wide research platform using GPT-4 and AWS Bedrock APIs, enabling semantic paper search and streamlined knowledge extraction for internal research data accessibility.

• Architected end-to-end RFQ processing pipeline, integrating custom spaCy NER and ensemble regression models(AdaBoost and Random Forest) with containerized deployment using Kubernetes, achieving 95% accuracy in PLC price predictions.

• Engineered full-stack solution for RFQ price prediction, utilizing a React frontend and FastAPI microservices with Jenkins CI/CD pipeline on AWS EC2, reducing manual quotation processing time from 7 days to 4 hours.

• Prototyped ML pipeline POC for casting defect detection using YOLOv5 on AWS SageMaker in a 2-member team, demonstrating proof-of-concept with React (TypeScript) dashboard and IoT integration achieving 78% detection accuracy.
• Optimized existing P&ID extraction pipeline by fine-tuning Mask R-CNN model, achieving 6% accuracy improvement over Detectron 2 baseline.
● Programmed automated ETL pipelines using PySpark and Python with SQL Server integration, implementing Selenium web scraping to process 10,000+ daily records with 80% efficiency gain.
● Established data warehouse architecture using SQL Server and MySQL, building automated data collection systems with Python and Selenium for 10+ concurrent data streams.
● Implemented Decision Tree and K-means Clustering algorithms for customer segmentation analysis of 5,000+ profiles, creating Power BI dashboards that drove 15% CTR improvement.
● Configured scalable PySpark data processing pipelines with custom SQL integrations, achieving 25% reduction in processing time and $10,000+ cost optimization.
● Directed Flutter-based indoor navigation system implementing A* pathfinding algorithm and custom geolocation services, reducing average path discovery time by 40%.
● Deployed backend infrastructure using Python and MongoDB, integrating RESTful APIs for real-time location updates and path optimization with GCP deployment.
● Architected CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment, implementing containerization with Docker and establishing automated build processes on GCP.

education.institution: State University of New York at Binghamton
education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence
Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering

questions.question: Why do you want to work at Ivo? Please answer in your own words?
questions.answer: I have previously worked in many startups including my own. Now that I am in US I am looking for something similar which we can grow together. Other than that I have worked in various tech stacks to provide solutions in computer vision and NLP, from Image Generation to Regression,  along with my current research in Vision Transformers, aligns well with the kind of expertise you’re seeking.

questions.question: Describe something impressive you've built or done so far in your life. Please answer in your own words?
questions.answer: Currently I am working on my hobby project - A Book reading platform (ReadQuest.site). It serves AI summarized books with expert LLM x RAG based AI bot to help you with your reading journey. Sites MOAT is its UI and UX which most of the sites lack especially in reading domain. Features include - Stable diffusion built summary videos, audio reader, click to define, bookmarks, Quotes and epub reader. I also maintain a hashnode doc to log what I added and how I did at https://readquest.hashnode.space/default-guide/first-portotype.
